lines.text: Uh oh. You hit the sheriff
Yeah, but I did not hit the deputy.
Correct me if I'm wrong, Pete - weren't you killed in a gunfight?
I was only gut shot. I'm stronger now with less appetite.

[after Brisco saves her from a huge explosion]
I have to go to the bathroom.
I know what you mean, kid.
If I was gonna kill you, I'd be stepping over your body right now on my way out the door.
Brisco, put me down!
Alright, you look bad in a wig and you were too easy to find.
Never look too deep into the mind of a lawyer.
[talking with an Italian gangster]
'If you yodel in the forest, the yoo-hoo that you yoo-hoo will be the yoo-hoo that you get back.'
Where were you from again?
I like that man.
You never were a very good judge of character, Ethan.
[Repeated line]
You touched my piece. NOBODY touches my piece!
[Ned is robbing a bank]
What are you lookin' at?
Nothing.
You callin' me nothin'?

[in reference to at least one thing per episode]
Very fancy!
